item.title: Linear Regression Simulation Study
item.description: Theories Model Assumptions Ordinary Least Square Estimator (OLS) of \(\beta\) Estimator of \(\sigma^2\) Simulation Visualize data points Estimating \(\beta\) and \(\epsilon\) Visualize fitted plane In general, linear regression is a linear approach of modelling the relationship of a numerical response (dependent) variable and one or more explanatory (independent) variables. Theories Model Assumptions Let: \(y_i \in \mathbb{R}^n\) as the measured response for the \(i\)th subject.
